description_html:
INOX stainless steel series, characterized by material efficiency and minimal form.

Designed as a modular range of bathtub, shower, and basin tapware, its iconic shapes radiate architectural control – featuring slim bodies, sophisticated design language and a luxurious satin or polished finish. Personalize any bathroom design with a selection of wall-mount, deck-mount, and floor-mount applications, and a choice of unique spout, mixer designs, and colors.
